TopicTitle: MPL processing occurs when the game is paused

Articles.Content:
Very easy to replicate this one, process an experiment in the mobile processing lab, pause the game and it'll carry on processing it.

Not sure how this could be exploited but it's a bug nonetheless. It'll drain the batteries but because the game is paused, your solar panels/nukes won't charge them back up again.
